An S4 class to represent a set of peaks

Source: R/AllClasses.R, R/extract.R
PeakPosition-class.Rd

An S4 class to represent a set of peaks

# S4 method for PeakPosition
[[(x, i)

Arguments

x

An object of class PeakPosition.
i

A length-one character vector specifying the element to extract or replace (see below). Character sring will be matched to the names of the slots.

Value

TODO

Slots

method

A character string specifying the method used for peak detection.

noise

A length one numeric vector giving the noise threshold.

window

A length one numeric vector giving the half-window size.

peaks

A four columns numeric matrix giving the peak positions.

spectrum

A GammaSpectrum object.

baseline

A BaseLine object.

Subset

In the code snippets below, x is a PeakPosition object.

x[[i]]

Extracts informations from a slot selected by subscript i. i is a character vector of length one.

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Slots
  • Subset
